mods.name: Sodium
mods.notes: Sodium is a rendering optimization mod that only affects the client. Installing on a server has no effect and may cause issues.

mods.name: Iris Shaders
mods.notes: Iris is a shader mod that has no server-side component. It should never be installed on servers.

mods.name: Oculus
mods.notes: Oculus is the Forge port of Iris shaders. Like Iris, it has no server-side functionality.

mods.name: BetterF3
mods.notes: BetterF3 modifies the F3 debug screen display. This is purely a client-side visual modification.

mods.name: Entity Culling
mods.notes: Entity Culling optimizes client-side rendering by not rendering entities that are not visible. Has no server component.

mods.name: Xaero's Minimap
mods.notes: Xaero's Minimap is a client-side minimap mod. While it can display other players, it does this client-side.

mods.name: Xaero's World Map
mods.notes: Xaero's World Map is a client-side world map mod with no server-side functionality.

mods.name: FancyMenu
mods.notes: FancyMenu customizes Minecraft menus. This is purely a client-side visual modification.

mods.name: Roughly Enough Items (REI)
mods.notes: REI is a recipe viewing mod. While it can have optional server features, it primarily runs client-side.

mods.name: EMI
mods.notes: EMI (Emancipated Mod Index) is a recipe viewer that runs entirely client-side.

mods.name: Immediately Fast
mods.notes: ImmediatelyFast optimizes immediate mode rendering on the client. No server functionality.

mods.name: Mouse Tweaks
mods.notes: Mouse Tweaks enhances inventory management with mouse controls. Purely client-side.

mods.name: Controlling
mods.notes: Controlling adds search functionality to the controls menu. Client-side only.

mods.name: Presence Footsteps
mods.notes: Presence Footsteps adds realistic footstep sounds. Audio-only, client-side mod.

mods.name: AppleSkin
mods.notes: AppleSkin shows food saturation and hunger restoration values. Client-side HUD mod.

mods.name: Not Enough Animations
mods.notes: Not Enough Animations adds first-person animations. Visual-only, client-side.

mods.name: CraftPresence
mods.notes: CraftPresence displays Minecraft activity on Discord. Requires Discord client, so server installation is meaningless.

mods.name: Drippyloadingscreen
mods.notes: Drippyloadingscreen customizes the loading screen. Client-side visual mod only.

mods.name: Ambient Sounds
mods.notes: Ambient Sounds adds environmental audio. Audio is processed client-side.

mods.name: Continuity
mods.notes: Continuity provides connected textures. This is a client-side visual feature.

mods.name: Fog
mods.notes: Pure visual mod that enhances fog rendering. No server-side component - fog is rendered entirely client-side.

mods.name: Sound Physics Remastered
mods.notes: Sound Physics provides realistic audio effects (reverb, attenuation, absorption). All audio processing is client-side only.
